column4: how can i tell if my nvida drivers were installed...  i used the synaptics package manager to install nvida-glx... it did someting with no errors.. and i rebooted.... ???
how can i tell if my nvida drivers were installed...  i used the synaptics package manager to install nvida-glx... it did someting with no errors.. and i rebooted.... ???
did you enable the driver?  did you see an nvidia logo?
